A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: words can't describe how disappointing this movie was. awful plot\, cringe worthy acting\, too many people trying to have that han solo one-liner\, just bad overall. and\, because it drives me insane\, they stuck a temporary tattoo on adam drivers face and said 'good enough'.\n\nas a sci-fi action movie\, it's /okay/. as a star wars movie? it's a joke. the force awakens had promise\, and rian johnson flushed it down the toilet.
